name: Miserere Game
description:
A game based on the original story "El miserere" from the great spanish writter Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. The game is an "adaptation" from the original story.

This game was made for a gamejam and is clearly not finished. You can expect a lot of bugs or errors. Nevertheless  we enjoyed doing it and we learned a lot from this experience.

CREDITS:

Game developer and programmer: Francisco Fernandez Cabezas.

Concept Artist and 2D and 3D art:  Sergio Lucas Pérez and Agustín Azpurua Tronchoni.

Historian and localization expert: Lidia Rodríguez Soto.

Original OST:  Facundo Gauna Diaz.
